mapper.select: SELECT id, title, type FROM zhousb_blog WHERE id < #{id} AND type = #{type} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT id, title, type FROM zhousb_blog WHERE id > #{id} AND type = #{type} LIMIT 1

SELECT zhousb_blog.title, zhousb_blog.type, system_menu.`path` typePath, system_menu.`name` typeName, content, zhousb_blog.remark, pv, zhousb_blog.gmt_create FROM zhousb_blog LEFT JOIN system_menu ON zhousb_blog.type = system_menu.`key` AND flag = 2 WHERE zhousb_blog.state = 0 AND zhousb_blog.id = #{id}
